short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add options to github PR and issues search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add dropdown menus for filtering PRs or issues by type, state, keywords and date pickers for searching by a date or date range. The additional UI parts will be displayed below the page container's header of the issue and pr list pages.
